name: Quartz mala with Aquamarine and Abalone
description:
Tibetan style 108 bead yoga meditation mala beads in with clear Quartz combined with tones of light green and light blue, highly individual meditation aid. Quartz beads catch light beautifully and the long, thin Abalone shell as a guru bead adds a very individual touch.

The main counters (108 beads) of this mala are clear Quartz. Each of the three divider beads are different combinations of crystals Aquamarine, African Turquoise Jasper, Amazonite, Larimar and white Agate. The guru bead includes several pieces of a long thin Abalone shell, Biwa pearls, Larimar white Agate and Aquamarine. A truly one of a kind mala. In addition to using this mala in meditation, it can be worn as a necklace, or even wrapped around the wrist for a few times. Wearing this mala as a long single length necklace particularly would make wonderful use of the crystals' healing energies as Quartz is known as a master healer and the length of this mala reaches down the whole torso.

Length of mala: 130 cm (51") all around measurement
Main bead diameter: 1 cm 
Width of the three divider bead combinations: approx. 3 cm 
Length of the guru bead combination: 9 cm

I have knotted each bead one by one for ease of handling, using strong light green micro-macrame cord. I draw artistic inspiration for these contemporary yoga meditation beads from the ancient decorative Buddhist malas from Tibet that were often given as gifts to Chinese courts and called "Chinese court necklaces". I match the stones and crystals carefully to create an energetic combination in the mala that will benefit the keeper in an individual way. All of my malas are one-of-a-kind.

This mala comes in a soft brown leather pouch . If you would rather have a fabric pouch, please let me know at the time of purchase.

Whilst this mala is made with Tibetan Buddhist bead count (108 beads), all my malas are dedicated to the Sacred Light and Unity of All – its future keeper may bless the mala as to their own wishes and purpose.

name: Wearable crystal book necklace
description:
A very feminine and decorative book necklace to keep your wishes and secrets close to your heart... Or treat someone close to your heart - maybe write your own message on the first page for your loved one to find when opening the book...

Yet still, this small book treasure doesn't look like a standard book. It is intricately crafted jewelry, a romantic jewel that as a bonus hides a vessel for your own content. Record those fleeting thoughts, pearls of wisdom and lines of poetry to make this truly your own "Wisdom Keeper" talisman.

I have knotted a decorative lace-like pattern in dark brown and burgundy red micro-macrame cord that extends across both covers and also forms the closing clasp. The knotwork is highlighted with deep red Garnet and clear Quartz beads. The larger crystal that closes the clasp is 'Shaman Dream Stone', inclusion Quartz known also as Lodolite. The necklace is braided with Burgundy cord and light grey pure silk ribbon. There's a decorative Garnet bead on the left side of the necklace braid. The book has many intricate details, including hand-sewn headbands.

The page size in the book is 3.5 cm x 4.8 cm (1.4" x 1.9") and there are 80 pages (40 leaves). The paper is white, 100gsm, acid-free and archival with hand-torn edges. The length of the necklace hanging down to the start of the book is 41 cm (16"). The leather is high quality vegetable tanned goat leather used in traditional bookbinding.

As this pendant hangs quite low to allow you to write in it while wearing it, it would also be perfect for someone who loves to combine jewellery and wear more than just one piece at a time. Combine this pendant with a shorter one or two for a very individual look.

No metal is used in this pendant, so it would also be perfect for those who have sensitivities to metals.

You'll receive this special one-of-a-kind book pendant carefully wrapped in pure silk and gift-wrapped at no extra charge.

name: Spirit Carrier crystal tassel necklace
description:
Natural eco-dyed silk necklace with a decorative 'tassel' formed with ten types of semi-precious stones. An unusual, one of a kind, Reiki-infused necklace that is easy to just sling on and go, light-weight and comfortable to wear.

The necklace is a set length, all-around measurement being 82 cm (32"), i.e. if measured from the back of the neck down to the top edge of the tassel, it is 41 cm (16"). The total length of the tassel from where it joins the silk necklace is approx. 4 cm (1.6").

The silk is unbleached sari silk which I have botanically dyed using ecological, natural methods (no harmful dyeing agents). There's no metal in this necklace so it's particularly suitable for those with sensitivities to metals.

The crystals, knotted with light grey micro-macrame cord, are:
Smokey Quartz
Sunstone
Ocean Jasper
Rose Quartz
Black Tourmaline
Banded Agate
African Jasper
Clear Quartz
Rhodonite
Bronzite

The crystal tassel is wonderful to hold and handle. A perfect amulet for a nature-loving free spirit.

You'll receive this amulet necklace in one of my handmade fabric draw-string pouches - great for the safe-keeping of the necklace. Gift-wrapped at no extra charge.

name: 'Wisdom Keeper' tribal iPad leather case in burgundy
description:
Unusual and different, completely unique, light-weight leather iPad case with shoulder strap. Inspired by native tribal style and ancient shamans' medicine pouches, complete with intricate bead details (wood, gemstones). The decorative floral embossing on the front flap is traditionally found on the covers of finely bound leather books. 
Measured as a sleeve for carrying an iPad, but this leather bag can also be used for carrying a diary, journal or a sketch book...

Supple and strong, yet comfortably light, this 'Wisdom Keeper' is made from the finest vegetable tanned African goat hide. It is the finest traditional, museum quality bookbinding leather, frequently covering the most valuable volumes of literary works in discerning book collections. Therefore, a stylish covering with an ancient feel for such a modern book-like device as iPad...

The pouch is carefully cut, folded, pierced and stitched by hand - one single stitch at a time - with strong waxed thread, and the bottom corners of the pouch are reinforced. The pouch is unlined, showing its natural soft suede inner, and has a long shoulder strap (also reinforced) that keeps the bag hanging a bit lower than hip level. It has no closure but a large frontal leather flap that rests over the pouch opening - the curved edge of the flap is the natural edge of the hide, finished with an eye-catching crystal detail consisting of Amethyst and Tourmaline beads. Hours of meticulous crafting and attention to detail hopefully makes this a treasured accessory for someone who's looking for a different, unusual take on an iPad case.

This is one-of-a-kind piece with unique detailing, any further pouches will never be exactly the same. Please expect and enjoy some natural surface markings on the leather which give this bag a natural, organic feel.

Dimensions of the wrapper sleeve: 20x25 cm 
The length of the shoulder strap, hanging from the top middle of the strap down to the top edge of the pouch: 56 cm (22") 
The width of the shoulder strap is approximately 2 cm.

This leather sleeve fits all versions of iPad, also iPad2 and iPad3 with the official 'Smart Cover' on. (Whilst this iPad sleeve is not designed for all the bulky items one might carry in a normal handbag, this one is a comfortable fit if you wanted to also slip in an iPhone.)

PROPHECY STONE is a pseudomorph of hematite, limonite, goethite after marcasite. If you look closely, you can see the original crystalline structure of the marcasite. A pseudomorph is a mineral that appears in a form other than its own crystalline structure, having totally replaced another, but the appearance and shape of the original mineral is retained - like a mold.
Brown and black stones are usually grounding - but not a Prophecy Stone! It works directly with the Crown chakra and the Third Eye chakra. Called "the healing stone of the future and eternity". Powerful meditation stone, it is quite unlike any other crystal you'll ever come across.
